tags: i'm really passionate about shit like this
bc i hate it when people assume how i feel about x or y
and all of the excuses im seeing for reposting the content feel shitty
summary: Hey guys? What’s up with ny’all assuming how phil feels about shit like posting the member exclusive content?  Don’t assume how...
body:
Hey guys? What’s up with ny’all assuming how phil feels about shit like posting the member exclusive content? 

Don’t assume how people feel or how they think about things. And DEFINITELY don’t base your assumptions on how they feel based off of other people’s opinions
ie: just bc dan feels/used to feel one way about something doesn’t mean that phil feels the same way?? they’re two completely separate people, they’re not going to feel the same about everything or agree on every topic

reblog.comment:
Hey guys? What’s up with ny’all assuming how phil feels about shit like posting the member exclusive content? 

Don’t assume how people feel or how they think about things. And DEFINITELY don’t base your assumptions on how they feel based off of other people’s opinions
ie: just bc dan feels/used to feel one way about something doesn’t mean that phil feels the same way?? they’re two completely separate people, they’re not going to feel the same about everything or agree on every topic

Don’t assume how people feel or how they think about things. And DEFINITELY don’t base your assumptions on how they feel based off of other people’s opinions
ie: just bc dan feels/used to feel one way about something doesn’t mean that phil feels the same way?? they’re two completely separate people, they’re not going to feel the same about everything or agree on every topic
trail.content:

blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

summary: Sometimes I worry about YouTube phannies because they invested time and effort into making a compilation of Dan Howell eating,,,...
body: Sometimes I worry about YouTube phannies because they invested time and effort into making a compilation of Dan Howell eating,,, but then,, I worry about myself instead. Because I’m the one who’s been *watching* a 6 minute long compilation of Dan Howell eating.

reblog.comment: Sometimes I worry about YouTube phannies because they invested time and effort into making a compilation of Dan Howell eating,,, but then,, I worry about myself instead. Because I’m the one who’s been *watching* a 6 minute long compilation of Dan Howell eating.

blog.name: callmemaeve-y
blog.title: me, an intellectual
blog.description: hi i'm the trash you forgot to take out

body:
spoilers for ii dvd

i just watched the interactive introverts dvd and i have a few things to say

  • dom!phil made so much appearance, i’m living for it
  • evil!phil’s statement on free wifi
  • teaching us that there are consequences for our actions
  • taking time to sit and chat and read and answer questions written on paper from the phandom (which was so phil is not on fire 1)
  • the awards on the parents, such a nice idea to include them
  • dan & furry jokes
  • phil’s diss track is bomb
  • albeit a bit sad at the end
  • dan & phil & piano is the dream team
  • i need someone to make an animatic out of the interactive introverts song
  • telling us that we’re as important to them as they are to us
  • the whole thing is just so amazing
  • (pardon the pun)
  • to dan and phil, thank you so much, for the effort, and for all these years :)
